verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's wife , Melania Trump , [V: will] skip this week 's G-7 summit in Quebec and does not plan to attend the planned June 12 summit in Singapore .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's wife , Melania Trump ,] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: skip] [ARG1: this week 's G-7 summit in Quebec] and does not plan to attend the planned June 12 summit in Singapore .
President Donald Trump 's wife , Melania Trump , will skip this week 's G-7 summit in Quebec and [V: does] not plan to attend the planned June 12 summit in Singapore .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's wife , Melania Trump] , will skip this week 's G-7 summit in Quebec and does [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: plan] [ARG1: to attend the planned June 12 summit in Singapore] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's wife , Melania Trump] , will skip this week 's G-7 summit in Quebec and does not plan to [V: attend] [ARG1: the planned June 12 summit in Singapore] .
President Donald Trump 's wife , Melania Trump , will skip this week 's G-7 summit in Quebec and does not plan to attend the [V: planned] [ARG1: June 12 summit] in Singapore .
